title: Stephanie Dabney, Electrifying Prima Ballerina, Dies at 64
description: A principal dancer with Dance Theater of Harlem, she was an international star, a memorable Firebird and an inspiration for dancers of color.
dc:creator: Claudia Bauer
media:description: Stephanie Dabney with Donald Williams in Dance Theater of Harlem’s “Firebird,” choreographed by John Taras, in 1982. A Times critic called her “the most incandescent Firebird imaginable.”
